label: Build Theme
command: mkdir -p themes && cargo run --release --manifest-path variable-substitutor/Cargo.toml -- -o themes/phine.json src/phine.json

label: Setup variable-substitutor
command: rm -rf ./variable-substitutor || true && git clone https://github.com/phisch/variable-substitutor.git && cargo build --release --manifest-path variable-substitutor/Cargo.toml
